title: Da Nang Tour 3 days 2 nights: Colors of Central Vietnam
description: Explore the captivating beauty of the coastal city of Da Nang, with its fine white sand beaches, unique bridges, and rich culinary scene.
itinerary: Day 1: Visit Son Tra Peninsula, Linh Ung Pagoda and watch the Dragon Bridge fire and water show on weekends.
Day 2: Experience Ba Na Hills, explore the famous Golden Bridge, the ancient French Village and Le Jardin D'Amour flower garden.
Day 3: Shop for local specialties, enjoy the beauty of Marble Mountains before ending the trip.
terms: Book the tour 7 days in advance for the best price
Cancel tour 3 days in advance with no fee
